title: Bait
description: *** BAIT HAS BEEN EDITED AND RE-RELEASED, WITH A NEW BOOK COVER, AS 'BAIT THE HOOK***Gemma is a man eater and she always gets her man, but this time around she was hungry for a real challenge - and she found one â€“ but did she finally bite off more than she could chew? Find out what the consequences are for this urban huntress when she sets her sights on some too big and much too wild game, using herself as the bait.Will she trap her man, or will the huntress become the hunted?
author: Kat Crimson
